proposal: #115 - Three New HRMP Channels batch On Polkadot
rationale: This referendum aims to accept and open return channels between Statemint and parachains BitGreen, SubSocial and Manta Network.
details: We support this referendum, because opening HRMP channels with Statemint allows those parachains the access to various native Polkadot assets.

rationale: This referendum aims to add a Bridge Hub (BH) parachain to Polkadot and connect it with Kusama, Ethereum and other networks.
details: We support this major upgrade for having Polkadot<>Kusama bridge allowing more interaction between both networks.

rationale: This referendum aims to reset the Watr blockchain back to seedling state.
details: Our goal by voting AYE is to help Watr progress to commercial deployment by reseting their parachain.

rationale: A treasury tip for @0xgoku_'s efforts on twitter creating a treasury audit and putting together the excel spreadsheet of past KSM proposals.
details: We like the activity of Goku, so the requested amount is rationale for his effort.

rationale: This referendum aims to provide funding for creating a course focused on the first-time users of Polkadot and Kusama.
details: The course that focuses on fist-time users is something we endorse so that's why voted AYE.

proposal: #32 - CP45 (RU): Runtime Upgrade 1018 + Add CFG and DOT to Asset Registry
rationale: This referendum will initiate Runtime Upgrade 1018 on Centrifuge and add CFG and DOT to the Asset Registry.
details: By voting AYE, we indicated the approval of expanding investment options for users on Tinlake.

rationale: This referendum aims to update Tinlake rewards allocation.
details: By voting AYE, we indicated the approval of changing the rewards on Centrifuge, which helps to upgrade the actual needs of Tinlake.
